thread.title: The secret behind Kamal’s new look
thread.title_full: The secret behind Kamal’s new look - The Times of India

author: M Suganth
title: The secret behind Kamal’s new look
text: Kamal Haasan is one actor who keeps experimenting with his looks in every film of his. Fans keenly await what getup their idol chooses next and go for the very same look themselves. The actor, who was seen in a bearded look (which he is sporting in his upcoming film Thoongaavanam) so far, is now being seen with a handlebar moustache (which feels like a variation of his looks in Thevar Magan and Maharasan). While there is buzz that this new getup could be for his upcoming film, we are told by a source close to him that the Ulaganayagan has gone for this look not for any film but just for a change.
